title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 17 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Mar 17 2022
description:
After 18 months, the New York Times finally concedes: Hunter Biden's laptop, Burisma/Ukraine connection is real. Clay and Buck had this analyzed correctly long ago, brought on guests about it, were, as usual, way ahead. Big Tech and Big Media colluded to bury the Hunter Biden laptop story and change the 2020 election. Zelensky says World War III "may have already started" and "we have the whole civilization at stake." Buck explains why we're not there yet. Poll declares that third of Americans would risk nuclear war with Russia over Ukraine. C&B say they think this means that possibly most of respondents don't understand the issues and ramifications. Jussie Smollett spent less than a week in jail. Clay says, "A lot of white privilege for Jussie, it appears."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
